title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to regulate hazardous
substances in order to protect the public health, safety and welfare, and the
lands, waters, air and environment of the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
598-1.1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
